lines.text: n and ans are integers , with ans = 0
for integer i = 0 to n exclusive
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: for j = i + 1 to n exclusive by increments of 2
lines.code: for ( int j = i + 1 ; j < n ; j += 2 )

lines.text: t = substring of from position i with length j - i + 1
lines.code: string t = a . substr ( i , j - i + 1 ) ;

lines.text: r = count of char ' R ' in t - count of char ' L ' in t
lines.code: r = count ( t . begin ( ) , t . end ( ) , ' R ' ) - count ( t . begin ( ) , t . end ( ) , ' L ' ) ;

lines.text: u = count of char ' U ' in t - count of char ' D ' in t
lines.code: u = count ( t . begin ( ) , t . end ( ) , ' U ' ) - count ( t . begin ( ) , t . end ( ) , ' D ' ) ;

lines.text: if r and u are both 0
print ans and a new line
